extends java.lang.Object
    Data class to hold information about Items

    • Method Detail

      • requiresOrder

        public boolean requiresOrder()
        Function to determine whether this item requires a re-order This is true if the current amount is less than the reorder amount
        Returns:
        true if this item requires a re-order, else false

      • printProperties

        public java.lang.String printProperties()
        Function to test that data object has been initialised properly
        Returns:
        string representing each input field

      • adjustAmount

        public void adjustAmount(int amount)
                  throws StockException
        Method used to adjust the current quantity of this particular item
        Parameters:
        amount - amount to adjust by (can be negative of positive)
        Throws:
        StockException - if, as a result of this method, a negative amount of the item is remaining
